title: Installation issue: intel-mkl-dnn due to "Cannot find a BLACS library for the given MPI"
body:
### Steps to reproduce the issue

```console
$ spack install intel-mkl-dnn %intel@19.0.3 ^intel-mkl
...
==> Error: InstallError: Cannot find a BLACS library for the given MPI.

/lustre/kcaps/lib/spack/spack/build_systems/intel.py:810, in scalapack_libs:
        807            blacs_lib = 'libmkl_blacs_intelmpi'
        808        elif '^mpt' in spec_root:
        809            blacs_lib = 'libmkl_blacs_sgimpt'
  >>    810        else:
        811            raise_lib_error('Cannot find a BLACS library for the given MPI.')
        812
        813        int_suff = '_' + self.intel64_int_suffix
```

### Platform and user environment

```commandline
$ uname -a 
Linux 3.10.0-514.el7.x86_64 #1 SMP Tue Nov 22 16:42:41 UTC 2016 x86_64 x86_64 x86_64 GNU/Linux
$ lsb_release -d
Description:    CentOS Linux release 7.3.1611 (Core)
```
